sub_title: Senior customer service | Sales support | SAP | Account receivables

school.name: Krasnoyarsk State Pedagogical University named after V.P. Astafieva

profile_positions.description:
•	Serving as Customer's focal point for all operational needs, collaborating with internal stakeholders, such as Sales, Product Management, Planning and Logistics, Finance to deliver results consistent with business strategy and best practices
•	Ensuring high quality service throughout the whole “Order To Cash Cycle” and being responsible for efficient, reliable and cost effective Customer Service in regards to cash generation, complaints, delivery, demand managing, order handling & swaps, pro-actively securing uninterrupted supply and demand processes, acting on escalations.
•	Coordinating complaint handling with Sales for price corrections, with Logistics for transport complaints and Quality / Tech. Service for product quality related issues
•	Participating and involvement in internal projects aiming at execution of improvement actions based on customer feedback and business requirements.
•	As part of working group, I have optimized and introduced uniform work instructions portfolio, which increased Customer Service department efficiency, productivity and cross functional cooperation and significantly reduced workflow
•	Creating and successfully implementing account receivable system which significantly improved order flow process, reducing overdues from 40% to 5-7%
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Service/Sales Support/Credit Control

profile_positions.description:
Customer service representative
· Tracking and securing a smooth workflow of orders from the entry to after-sales activities up to
receiving payments from customers and dealing flexibly with all kind of upcoming customer
support in perceived top-quality;
· Negotiating with principals of the production logistics: delivery dates and terms, volumes and
availability of products;
· Forecasting and planning
· Desk selling - supporting the sales activities by answering customer requests with a positive
attitude via phone and mail; regular requests to customers about possible sales activities
· Determining root cause(s) for raised issues, developing practical solutions and value-added
recommendations, and concluding as to the effectiveness and efficiency of overall controls and
business practices
· Resolving issues regarding smooth workflow by liaising with different departments
· Preparing and developing of guidelines and instructions re different processes
· Processing and follow up of customers' complaints (Issue credit notes for value according to the
procedures, FOC orders)
· Archiving of documents related to order processing and shipments
· Assistance with after-sales care, including replacements in close cooperation with Technical
Service
· Visits to customers providing interpreting service to the European Sales Team
Support to the Global Marketing team
· Supporting global Colormatrix marketing strategies for projects, including company websites
and social media in Russia
· Organizing creating marketing materials (translation, publishing), making sure they undergo
regular review and adhere to brand guidelines
· Organizing participation of the company in the local trade shows

profile_positions.description: • Assisting with day to day operations of HR functions and duties • Providing clerical and administrative support to Human Resources executives • Processing documentation and preparing reports relating to personnel activities (staffing, recruitment, training, grievances, performance evaluations) • Dealing with employee requests regarding human resources issues, rules, and regulations • Coordinating communication with candidates and scheduling interviews • Conducting initial orientation to newly hired employees
profile_positions.title: Assistant to HR Department

company.name: Krasnoyarsk State University, Foreign Languages Department

profile_positions.company: Krasnoyarsk State University, Foreign Languages Department
profile_positions.description: Assisting with day to day operations of HR functions and duties • Lecture planning, preparation and research, writing research proposals, papers and other publications • Reviewing pre-set educational goals, classroom instructional programs, establishing academic and other performance objectives • Handling administrative activities including event management such as trainings/seminars/conferences • Exam writing and administration
profile_positions.title: Lecturer, Languages/Translating
